mapper.select: /* /personnel/certificate/certificateMapper.xml - certificateIssue(증명서전체정보 가져오기) */ SELECT XX.CRTF_ISNO AS crtfIsno /*발행번호*/ ,XX.EMP_EMNO AS empEmno /*사원번호*/ ,XX.EMP_NAME AS empName /*성명*/ ,COMM_NAME AS commName /*증명서종류*/ ,XX.CRTF_USE AS crtfUse /*용도*/ ,DATE_FORMAT(XX.CRTF_DATE,"%Y-%m-%d") AS crtfDate /*발행일*/ FROM ( SELECT X.*,EMP_NAME FROM ( SELECT * FROM CERTIFICATE WHERE CRTF_DEL_YN = "N" )X, EMPLOYEE E WHERE X.EMP_EMNO = E.EMP_EMNO )XX, COMMON C WHERE XX.COMM_CODE = C.COMM_CODE ORDER BY XX.CRTF_SEQ DESC

/* /personnel/certificate/certificateMapper.xml - insertData(신청시 사원정보가져오기) */ SELECT XX.EMP_EMNO AS empEmno /*사원번호*/ ,XX.EMP_NAME AS empName /*성명*/ ,XX.RANK_NAME AS rankName /*직위/직급명*/ ,DEPT_NAME AS deptName /*부서명*/ FROM( SELECT X.*, RANK_NAME FROM( SELECT * FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE EMP_EMNO = #{emno} )X, RANK R WHERE X.RANK_CODE = R.RANK_CODE )XX, DEPARTMENT D WHERE XX.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_CODE
